issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] Projection physical plan compilation should preserve nullability
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When compiling logical plan to physical plan, field nullability should be preserved.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9158?focusedCommentId=17143229) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7466
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7466>
